snippet: A new tax credit passed by the legislature is intended to persuade Broadway producers to use upstate theaters as rehearsal halls and construction shops for shows going on national tour.
abstract: A new tax credit passed by the legislature is intended to persuade Broadway producers to use upstate theaters as rehearsal halls and construction shops for shows going on national tour.

headline.main: New York Tax Credit to Encourage Theater Productions Upstate
headline.print_headline: New York Tax Credit For Upstate Rehearsals
